markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Mantis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3094)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These massive cousins of praying mantises stand taller than an average human.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Giant_Mantis.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Giant Mantis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3094)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 229 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet, fly 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
leg +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+5 piercing plus Capturing Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles + 12,
**Damage** 1d12+5 piercing

**Capturing Grab** <actions string="Single Action" />  This ability functions as [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45), plus on a success, the mantis can choose to pull the creature adjacent to it, then makes a mandibles Strike against the creature. This extra benefit doesn't apply when the mantis maintains the Grab.

**Lunging Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant mantis lunges forward, making a leg Strike with an extended reach of 20 feet. If it hits, the mantis can use Capturing Grab after the Strike even if the creature is out of reach.

**Sudden Strike**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the giant mantis.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-442" />
name: Giant Mantis

This extra benefit doesn't apply when the mantis maintains the Grab. Lunging Strike Two Actions The giant mantis lunges forward, making a leg Strike with an extended reach of 20 feet. If it hits, the mantis can use Capturing Grab after the Strike even if the creature is out of reach.
